Stars & Star Makers [/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|” module_class=”box-img-section” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#0f0f0f” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#0f0f0f” background_color_gradient_end=”#333333″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ module_class=”box-img-left” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/connections-bg.png” background_size=”contain” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”20px||20px|” animation_style=”fade”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ module_class=”overlay-text” _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Award-Winning Connections” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_2_text_color=”#ef3caf” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”]

Award-Winning Connections

You likely won’t find a music talent agency that provides you with such a plethora of connections like Vocal Star. With opportunities to learn from Pop stars, have your questions answered by industry professionals, record your own song with award-winning artists, producers, sound mixers, and engineers, and even perform auditions in front of a panel of record labels and agency executives, it doesn’t get much better than this.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”#connections” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Learn More” module_class=”bg-pink” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ animation_style=”zoom”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”||on” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#0f0f0f” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#0f0f0f” background_color_gradient_end=”#333333″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/friends.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_color=”rgba(51,51,51,0.8)” background_size=”contain” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”0px||0px|” custom_padding=”70px|20px|70px|20px” animation_style=”fade” make_fullwidth=”on”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Award-Winning Connections” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_2_text_color=”#00a2c3″ text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”]

Award-Winning Connections

You likely won’t find a music talent agency that provides you with such a plethora of connections like Vocal Star. With opportunities to learn from Pop stars, have your questions answered by industry professionals, record your own song with award-winning artists, producers, sound mixers, and engineers, and even perform auditions in front of a panel of record labels and agency executives, it doesn’t get much better than this.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”#connections” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Learn More” module_class=”bg-pink” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ animation_style=”zoom”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_id=”connections” _builder_version=”3.22″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#ef3caf” background_color_gradient_end=”#333333″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” animation_style=”fade” border_width_top=”2″ border_color_top=”#00a2c3″ border_width_bottom=”2″ border_color_bottom=”#8300e9″ box_shadow_style=”preset6″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ z_index_tablet=”500″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”The Connections” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_2_text_color=”#00a2c3″ background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_delay=”500ms”]

The Connections

The following are the music industry leaders who so graciously work with our music talent agency to provide you with the invaluable connections you need to succeed in this competitive industry:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.22.7″ background_color=”#000000″ inner_width_tablet=”50px” inner_max_width_tablet=”50px” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px” z_index_tablet=”500″][et_pb_fullwidth_code admin_label=”Image Slider” _builder_version=”4.4.4″ background_color=”#000000″ text_orientation=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px” animation_style=”fade” z_index_tablet=”500″]

[/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#333333″ background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/crowd.jpg” parallax=”on” parallax_method=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Leadership” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_3_text_color=”#ef3caf” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” z_index_tablet=”500″]

Leadership

  • George Caceres – Founder, Executive Producer

  • Adam H. Hurstfield – Executive Producer

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Cinematographers” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_3_text_color=”#ef3caf” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” z_index_tablet=”500″]

Cinematographers

  • Marcus Casian – Photography

  • Kent Speakman – Knekt TV 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Producers” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_3_text_color=”#ef3caf” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” z_index_tablet=”500″]

Producers

  • David Parks – Executive Producer
  • Adam H – Record Producer
  • Damon Sharpe – Record Producer
  • Dakota Duclo – Production Coordinator

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Customer Service” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_3_text_color=”#ef3caf” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” z_index_tablet=”500″]

Customer Service

  • Regina Lampert – Finance Manager

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Experts” _builder_version=”4.7.0″ header_3_text_color=”#ef3caf” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” hover_enabled=”0″ z_index_tablet=”500″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Experts

  • Bella Thorne – Movie Star, Influencer & Recording Artist
  • Paul Becker – Choreographer
  • Elise Estrada – Recording Artist
  • Orlando Calsada – Sound Mixer
  • Joey Paul Jensen – Entertainment Industry Consultant
  • Don Wolf – Vocal Coach

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Production” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_3_text_color=”#ef3caf” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” z_index_tablet=”500″]

Production

  • Paul Becker – Director

  • Jessie Rodriguez – Lighting

  • Eliza Nourhian – Production Design

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Operations” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_3_text_color=”#ef3caf” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” z_index_tablet=”500″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px”]

Operations

  • Barry Macdonald – Talent Relations
  • Lisa Coduto – Talent Coordinator
  • Amy Weldon – International Talent Director

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Branding And Marketing” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_3_text_color=”#ef3caf” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” z_index_tablet=”500″]

Branding And Marketing

  • Jason Ellis – Supreme Productions 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
